Company_Name: CONG TY CO PHAN CHUNG KHOAN VPBANK
Title: Data Engineer
Description:
Phat trien va van hanh he thong Data Warehouse va he thong quan ly du lieu, bao gom:
Phat trien cac nen tang tich hop du lieu, khai pha du lieu, thiet ke du lieu va khai thac du lieu.
Trien khai cac quy trinh va he thong giam sat chat luong du lieu, dam bao luon luon cung cap du lieu co do tin cay cao cho cac ben lien quan va cac quy trinh nghiep vu co nhu cau, va chat luong du lieu.
Thiet ke va trien khai ha tang dap ung cho nhu cau luu tru, xu ly va phan tich du lieu lon.
Hop tac voi cac thanh vien khac trong bo phan (Data Analysts, Data Scientists...) va ngoai bo phan (IT, nghiep vu...) de hoan thanh muc tieu chung.
Dua ra cac giai phap va sang kien cai tien hieu suat he thong va tiet kiem chi phi cung nhu thoi gian trien khai:
To chuc cac buoi seminar ve cong nghe
Cung phoi hop va ho tro cac bo phan khac giai quyet van de ky thuat.
Cac ban de xuat sang kien cai tien chat luong, hieu suat
Requirement:
Trinh do Hoc van/ Educational Qualifications:Tot nghiep Dai hoc tro len cac nganh Khoa hoc may tinh, Cong nghe thong tin, He thong thong tin quan ly hoac tuong duong.
Kien thuc, Chuyen mon Co Lien Quan/Relevant Knowledge/ Expertise
Database: Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redshift, Big Query...Luu tru: Hadoop, Cassandra, S3....Nen tang dien toan dam may: AWS, Azure, GoogleETL tools: ODI, SSIS, Pentaho, Spark....Thanh thao it nhat 1 trong cac ngon ngu lap trinh nhu SQL, R, Python, Java, Scala, SparkCo kien thuc ve Data Warehouse, Data Mart; cac phuong phap thiet ke nhu Kimball-Inmon...
Database: Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redshift, Big Query...
Luu tru: Hadoop, Cassandra, S3....
Nen tang dien toan dam may: AWS, Azure, Google
ETL tools: ODI, SSIS, Pentaho, Spark....
Thanh thao it nhat 1 trong cac ngon ngu lap trinh nhu SQL, R, Python, Java, Scala, Spark
Co kien thuc ve Data Warehouse, Data Mart; cac phuong phap thiet ke nhu Kimball-Inmon...
Cac Ky Nang/ Skills
Kha nang lam viec doc lap hoac theo doi nhomKha nang tuan thu quy che va thich nghi voi cong nghe moi
Kha nang lam viec doc lap hoac theo doi nhom
Kha nang tuan thu quy che va thich nghi voi cong nghe moi
Cac Kinh nghiem Lien quan/ Relevant Experience:It nhat 2 nam kinh nghiem lam viec tai vi tri Data Engineer, Software Developer hoac tuong tu.
Right:
Thu nhap hap dan, luong thuong theo performance.
Thuong cac ngay Le /Tet (theo chinh sach cong ty tung thoi ki)
Fix luong thang 13
Che do ngay phep hap dan theo tung cap bac
BHXH, BH suc khoe Vpbank care.
Duoc tham gia cac khoa dao tao tuy thuoc vao khung dao tao cho tung vi tri.
Thoi gian lam viec: tu thu 2 - thu 6.
Lam viec: 40h/ tuan.
Moi truong lam viec nang dong, than thien, co nhieu co hoi hoc dao tao, hoc hoi va phat trien; duoc tham gia nhieu hoat dong van hoa thu vi (cuoc thi ve the thao, tai nang, hoat dong team building,...)
Place: Tang 25, Toa nha VPBank 89 Lang Ha, Quan Dong Da, Thanh pho Ha Noi

Title: Data Engineer
Description:
Work closely with the data science and business intelligence teams to develop data models and pipelines for research, reporting, and machine learning.
Develop automation Python script to support internal teams like CRM, Admin framework, ad hoc project
Develop API using Python framework for internal transfer data.
Work with data to solve business problems, building and maintaining the infrastructure to answer questions and improve processes.
Help streamline our data science workflows, adding value to our product offering and building out our customer lifecycle and retention models.
Requirement:
At least 3 years of experience with Python, SQL, and data visualization/exploration tools.
At least 1 year of experience working with AI tool for coding or research
Knowledge of programming languages such as SQL, Postgres, BigQuery, ClickHouse, and Python, as well as NoSQL databases like MongoDB and Elasticsearch.
Technical proficiency in database design and development, data modeling, data mining techniques, and segmentation.
Experience working with ETL frameworks and databases.
Strong problem-solving, teamwork, and communication skills (both verbal and written).
Comfortable working in a dynamic, research-oriented environment with multiple concurrent projects.
Right:
Comprehensive benefits - Full insurance coverage, lunch & parking allowance, and additional support.
Attractive compensation - Competitive salary (negotiable) with performance-based bonuses.
Exciting start-up environment - Work with experienced leaders in a fast-paced, innovative team.
Career growth - Take on new challenges, sharpen your skills, and make a real impact. Training support and clear career progression.
Flexible & fun workplace - Modern office, flexible hours, and remote-friendly options.
Team bonding & celebrations - Company birthday events, parties, Happy Hour, and annual team trips.
Work Location:173 Tran Nao, An Khanh, Thu Duc, Ho Chi Minh City
Working Hours:Monday - Friday (08:30 - 18:00), Saturday (08:30 - 12:00)
Place: 173 Tran Nao, Phuong An Khanh, Thanh pho Thu Duc, Thanh pho Ho Chi Minh

Title: Data Engineer - Khoi Du lieu (HOLT.02)
Description:
Thuc hien cong viec tich hop, phat trien du lieu, ho tro van hanh he thong cong nghe du lieu trong mang chuc nang duoc giao dam bao dung quy trinh, quy dinh cua MB nham thuc hien thanh cong muc tieu chung cua don vi.
Tu phat trien hoac phoi hop cung cac nha cung cap phat trien/trien khai cac giai phap Cong nghe du lieu theo cac cong viec duoc phan cong.
Duy tri hoat dong cua cac san pham/dich vu duoc phan cong.
Nghien cuu, tim kiem, tham muu cac giai phap/sang kien Cong nghe du lieu va de xuat nha cung cap dap ung yeu cau cua cong viec.
Phat trien, kiem thu (Unit test), nghiem thu va ho tro muc 2 (Level 2) cac san pham va dich vu Cong nghe du lieu
Requirement:
Tot nghiep Dai hoc cac chuyen nganh Cong nghe thong tin, Dien tu-Vien thong, Toan Tin, Khoa hoc may tinh, Khoa hoc du lieu,...
Uu tien ung vien co mot trong cac chung chi nghe quoc te ve lap trinh phat trien du lieu ve Oracle (Oracle Certified Associate (OCA), Oracle Certified Professional (OCP), Oracle Certified Master (OCM), Oracle Certified Expert (OCE) va Specialist cho Oracle Database 12c...), Netezza, BI Tableau, BI publisher, Cloud ( AWS Certified Solutions Architect, AWS Certified Developer - Associate, ...).
TOEIC 450 hoac chung chi tuong duong.
Right: Trai nghiem Thu nhap hap dan voi goi dai ngo toan dien:
Place: MB Tower, so 18 Le Van Luong, Phuong Trung Hoa, Quan Cau Giay, Thanh pho Ha Noi

Title: Data Engineer (Nifi, English)
Description:
Designing, building, testing, and maintaining scalable data pipelines and management systems
Developing high-performance algorithms, predictive models, and prototypes to improve data efficiency
Ensuring data architecture aligns with business requirements and industry best practices
Integrating emerging data management and software engineering technologies into existing data structures
Establishing efficient processes for data mining, modeling, and production
Creating and optimizing custom software components and analytics applications
Exploring new ways to leverage existing data for business insights and operational improvements
Utilizing a wide range of programming languages and tools to integrate data systems effectively
Implementing and updating disaster recovery strategies for data infrastructure
Continuously enhancing data reliability, quality, and security through best practices and innovative solutions
Requirement:
Bachelor's degree in Data Science, Computer Science, IT, or related field
At least 4 years of experience as a Data Engineer or in a similar role
Expertise in Data Modeling, Architecture, Warehousing, and Lakes
Proficiency in Linux/Unix, shell scripting, and at least one scripting language (Python, R, etc)
Experience with ETL tools (e.g., Spark, Nifi, Pentaho)
Hands-on experience with HDFS-based analytics (processing, storage, governance, security)
Solid understanding of RDBMS (MySQL, PostgreSQL, or similar) and NoSQL
Cloud experience (Azure) preferred; microservices deployment is a plus
Strong communication skills in English
Right:
Competitive salary, 13th-month salary, and bonuses (variable bonus, loyalty, referral, etc.)
100% salary and full insurance coverage during the probation period
Premium healthcare plan and additional insurance
14-18 days of paid leave annually
Place: Tang 5, Etown 2, 364 Cong Hoa, Phuong 13, Quan Tan Binh, Thanh pho Ho Chi Minh

Title: Data Engineering Manager
Description:
All Levels (scope and complexity will increase from single product and domain to multiple products and/or domains).
Structure end-to-end processes of data extraction, transformation, and storage to deploy models and analytical solutions in real-time and offline analytic processing.
Handle activities such as quality assurance, data migration and integration, and solution deployment to ensure the business gets the best value.
Implement, maintain, and further develop ETL processes, data lineage, and observability across large-scale data ingestion from a variety of sources.
Design and implement data flows to ensure efficient and reliable data movement (e.g., unit and integration tests).
Provide technical support in understanding business problems and designing smart data products.
Collaborate within an agile culture, contributing to the team's success.
Maintain strong relationships with stakeholders to ensure collaboration and delivery of objectives (Relationship creation and management of broader team's stakeholders to ensure strong connection and collaboration for team).
Continued self-development and research of best-in-class analytical approached (management and/or development and capability building of Junior/Senior Data Engineers).
Potential responsibility for selection of AA Vendors and AA Tooling workbench (Procurement & Enablement of tools sits with GIS).
Requirement:
BA/MSc in Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field; equivalent work experience accepted. (MSc/PhD)
3+ years in a pure analytical/science role (5+ years)
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Significant commercial experience in a similar position.
Proficiency with Python (inc. strong data analytics skills using Python).
Excellent software engineering skills (including unit testing, integration testing, OOP).
Experience working with large datasets through Spark and RDBMS.
Solid knowledge of PySpark with the ability to apply it to write Spark applications as well as analyze data in a distributed environment.
Experience working with a large development team (CI/CD).
Very good SQL skills and ability to extract information from databases.
Ability to build and maintain strong collaborative relationships with stakeholders across the business.
Demonstrated ability to effectively manage multiple simultaneous projects and deliverables.
Communicate effectively with various stakeholders, tailoring your message to your audience's level of technical understanding
Experience with Azure development environment
Experience in building/releasing Infrastructure as Code (e.g., Terraform).
Experience with containerization technologies and orchestrators (e.g., Docker and Kubernetes).
Understanding of machine learning models, deployment, and monitoring.
Interest in machine learning and/or desire to develop skills.
Experience working in agile organizations.
Excellent written and verbal English.
Right:
A diverse and open working culture, where your true identity is celebrated.
Multiple career opportunities to rotate within Functions or cross-functions.
Your wellbeing will be taken care by our Health & Safety Team since Day 1.
Be a part of our sustainability journey in Brewing the Better Vietnam.
Performance appraisal twice a year to guarantee constructive feedback
Performance bonus (estimated at least 3 months) and 13th month salary bonus
Bao Viet Insurance for employees and family
Annual leave: 18 days/year
Flexible benefit voucher
80% lunch in canteen
Annual team building, Town hall, YEP
Gift for special holidays and sponsor traveling ticket in Tet Holiday
Working hours: Monday to Friday (Morning 8:00 AM - 12:00 PM, Afternoon 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM)
Place: Vietcombank Tower, 18th & 19th floor, 05 Cong Truong Me Linh, Phuong Ben Nghe, Quan 1, Thanh pho Ho Chi Minh
